parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rack and pinion steering system can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The steering wheel is hard to turn
the steering wheel freezes up
the steering column is extremely loose
the steering is stiff during morning startup
the steering ability is decreased when cold
the tie rod separates
the wheel turns out
and the vehicle loses steering control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cold power steering issue can cause decreased steering ability, making it difficult to control the vehicle, especially during morning startup.
symptoms: The steering wheel is hard to turn
the steering ability is decreased when cold
the steering is stiff during morning startup.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A loose steering column can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The steering column is extremely loose
causing loss of vehicle control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the tie rod can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The left inner tie rod separates
the wheel turns out
and the vehicle loses steering control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belts can increase the risk of injury or fatality in the event of an accident, as occupants may not be properly restrained.
symptoms: The seat belts fail to engage
the seat belt clasp fails
the seat belt buckle cannot be latched
the seat belts are unable to be repaired to original condition.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden stalling of the engine without prior warning can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls while driving
often without warning
and may be accompanied by a loss of power or strange noises.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water pump can cause engine overheating, leading to engine damage, stalling, or even engine failure, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Coolant leaks
overheating engine
engine stalling
or unusual noises from the engine compartment.
